data.comment: The match is underway in Leicester.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Fulham at King Power Stadium.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Leicester have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Can Leicester capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a Fulham throw-in in Leicester's half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Leicester push forward at King Power Stadium and Youri Tielemans gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fulham defence.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Fulham.
Ademola Lookman of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Simon Hooper awards Leicester a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick Leicester.
Harrison Reed (Fulham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Important block from the Fulham defence as James Maddison fires in a strike for Leicester.
In the minute 19, Youri Tielemans hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Leicester for Leicester.
Leicester apply pressure at King Power Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Wesley Fofana but the strike hits the bar!
Goal kick for Fulham at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 21, Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in Leicester.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Leicester.
Jamie Vardy for Leicester drives towards goal at King Power Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Leicester Fulham drive forward through Antonee Robinson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Fulham.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
In the minute 30, Goal! Fulham have got their heads in front thanks to a Ademola Lookman strike.
Great play from Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa to set up the goal.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fulham have been given a penalty...
In the minute 38, Goal! Ivan Cavaleiro extends Fulham's lead from the spot. They now lead 0-2.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Fulham.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 40, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fulham pushes forward through Ivan Cavaleiro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 43, Leicester are coming forward and James Maddison gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Simon Hooper signals a Leicester throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 45, Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
Simon Hooper awards the away team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester.
In Leicester, Dennis Praet of Leicester is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Christian Fuchs of Leicester smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at King Power Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Harvey Barnes is on a sub for Dennis Praet for Leicester.
In the minute 46, Brendan Rodgers is making the team's second substitution at King Power Stadium with Cengiz Under replacing Luke Thomas.
In the minute 48, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leicester close to the penalty box.
Fulham's Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa is on target but unsuccessful.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Leicester, close to Fulham's area.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Fulham needs to be cautious. Leicester have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Leicester's Youri Tielemans gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
In the minute 58, Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Ademola Lookman (Fulham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Leicester have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick Leicester.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Fulham.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 67, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
Cengiz Under gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leicester.
In the minute 69, Simon Hooper awards Fulham a goal kick.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kelechi Iheanacho is replacing Nampalys Mendy for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Fulham push forward at King Power Stadium and Ruben Loftus-Cheek gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leicester defence.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Fulham's Ademola Lookman gets in a shot on goal at King Power Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in Leicester.
Harrison Reed is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Fulham's Harrison Reed is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Ruben Loftus-Cheek with Mario Lemina. This is the first substitution made today by Scott Parker.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Fulham in the half of Leicester.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Can Leicester capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Cengiz Under (Leicester) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Fulham at King Power Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bobby Reid.
Bobby Reid is back on his feet again.
In the minute 85, Leicester to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
Harvey Barnes keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 86, That's a fine assist from Jamie Vardy.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Aleksandar Mitrovic is replacing Ivan Cavaleiro for the away team.
In the minute 88, In Leicester Leicester attack through James Maddison. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Free kick Fulham.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Leicester's area.
In the minute 89, Tosin Adarabioyo (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Simon Hooper.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Fulham.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Leicester are pushing forward but James Michael Justin's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Leicester, close to Fulham's area.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Fulham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Joe Bryan replacing Ademola Lookman.
